title: Understanding Free Energy
text: For a reaction to be spontaneous, the change in free energy, represented by ΔG, should be negative. Recall the relationship, ΔG $$=$$ ΔH - TΔS.

title: Analyzing Change in Entropy (ΔS)
text: If the change in entropy (ΔS) is negative, explore what the term TΔS becomes as T (temperature) increases. How does this affect the overall ΔG?

title: The Role of Enthalpy (ΔH)
text: Consider how the sign and magnitude of ΔH interact with ΔG when ΔS is negative. Can ΔH influence the total balance?

title: Condition for Spontaneity
text: Combine your insights about ΔH and TΔS to identify when ΔG will be negative for a spontaneity under negative ΔS conditions.
